content.rendered:
SMBT-1T02 (V2.0) is a single board solution with Bluetooth classic and Low energy dual mode 4.0.
SMBT-1T02 (V2.0) provides Bluetooth SPP (Serial Port Profile) function, and SPP over GATT (Generic
Attribute Profile) and LE (Low Energy) function specified in Bluetooth™ Specifications. It has inbuilt MCU and firmware for Bluetooth profiles.

excerpt.rendered:
• Internal Crystal Oscillator(26Mhz)
  • Bluetooth 4.0/3.0/2.0 Module
  • On Board Chip antenna
  • UART(SPP) data connection interface
  • Auto Discover/Pairing
